data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Shangqiu, Henan, China.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shangqiu, Henan, China
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Shangqiu unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Shangqiu, Henan, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 574,300 who are far from you in Shangqiu, Henan, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Shangqiu, Henan, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Shangqiu, Henan, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of Shangqiu, Henan, China has a population of 632,500.

We estimate Shangqiu has 47,982 people who might know Jesus, 10,218 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 574,300 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Shangqiu.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
